title: All lit up
creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas and Gas Council
brief_description: An exhilarating presentation of the story of the use of fire for warmth and comfort since the days of the Romans. Shows something of the inherent problems that have persisted until today; with the use of an ingenious yet simple invention, the major difficulties have been solved.
